original: Elghammar, Carl Axel Eric, landsfiskal, Trollhättan, f. 25/2/02 i Sthlm av kont:chefen Axel Alfred E. o. Hil- ma Carolina Hermanson. G. 30 m. Gudrun Kjellin. Barn: Sif f. 34. — Stud :ex. v. Palmgr. sam-sk. i Sthlm 21, stud. v. Sthilms högsk. 21-23, lands-fiskalsex. i Sthlm 28. Statsstip. f. stud. av domstolar o. processförfar, i Norge 46. E. landsfiskal i Nacka distr. 29, dito i Solna distr. 32, tf. landsfiskal i Danderyds distr. 38-39,. landsfiskal i Ljusdals distr. 42, tj:ledig f. of’f. uppdr. inom allm. säkerh:tj. 41-45, landsfiskal o. polischef i Trollhättans distr. sed. 45, civ :försv :chef i Trollhättans stad o. kretschef v. civ:-försv. i Älvsb. 1. fr. 46. Ordf. i tra-fiksäkerh :komm. i Trollhättan, ordf. i 1. krets, av Älvsb. 1. polistekn. fören., led. av fören. Sv:es landsfiskaler, Sv. kriminaListfören. o. Trolilhättans Rota-rykl. Hobbies: saltsjöfiske, friluftsliv, litteratur.
translated: Elghammar, Carl Axel Eric, district attorney, Trollhättan. Born February 25, 1902 in Stockholm to the chief accountant Axel Alfred E. and Hilma Carolina Hermanson. Married to Gudrun Kjellin in 1930, with one child: Sif, born in 1934. Completed a student exam at Palmgrenska sam-sk. in Stockholm in 1921, studied at Sthilms högsk. from 1921 to 1923, and became a district attorney in Stockholm in 1928. Received a government scholarship for studying court systems and court procedures in Norway in 1946. He served as a district attorney in Nacka distr. from 1929, in Solna distr. from 1932, acting district attorney in Danderyds distr. from 1938 to 1939, district attorney in Ljusdals distr. in 1942, and was on leave from official duties within the public security service from 1941 to 1945. He became a district attorney and police chief in Trollhättans distr. in 1945, civil defense chief in Trollhättans stad and district chief in Älvsb. from 1946. He was the chairman of the traffic safety committee in Trollhättan, and the chairman of the 1st district of Älvsb. police technical association. He was a member of the Swedish district attorneys association, the Swedish criminal association, and the Trollhättans Rotary club. His hobbies include sea fishing, outdoor activities, and literature.
